title: New Client crashing when saving runes
body: Every time I've saved my runes on the new client my game would crash and I would have to manually close the client only for it to re-open automatically with my runes **unsaved**. Has this been happening to others or just me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like you might need to [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.

I have tried this twice and the problem seems to persist. I don't know what I'm suppose to do now.

Quite odd, I'm going to defer you to our Player Support specialists for this one, [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with all the details of your issue that you can provide.
